title: Open Tues 6:30-7pm,2BR/1BA apartment  in Nob Hill (1525 Jackson #1)
posting_body: Second floor 2BR/1BA apartment on Jackson Street in Nob Hill neighborhood on the border with Cow Hollow.
Floors are hardwood except in kitchen and bath.
Bedrooms are at the front of the apartment, facing the street.
One bedroom has an ornamental fireplace and built-in cabinets; it has a large closet near the entrance to the apartment.
The other bedroom has a standard closet.
Living room is behind one of the bedrooms, has a credenza, and provides access to the kitchen.
There is a closet just outside of the bath in the hall.
Building is on Jackson at Polk.
It's less than a block to the center of Polk Street's shopping and dining district's many offerings.
Bus lines 1, 10, 12, 19, 27, 47, 49 and shuttles on Van Ness Avenue are all within a few blocks' walking distance.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
